messages.content: You are a business consultant specializing in coffee shop revenue optimization.
My coffee shop has 400 daily customers, an average order value of $7.50, and operates for 14 hours. I spend $500.00 on marketing, and my foot traffic is 800. How can I increase revenue?

Based on your data, focus on these areas: 1) Increase marketing ROI by targeting local audiences. 2) Upsell higher-margin items. 3) Consider adjusting store hours to align with peak foot traffic. 4) Offer promotions to attract new customers.
You are a business consultant specializing in coffee shop revenue optimization.
My coffee shop has 100 daily customers, an average order value of $9.00, and operates for 10 hours. I spend $50.00 on marketing, and my foot traffic is 200. How can I increase revenue?

Based on your data, focus on these areas: 1) Increase marketing ROI by targeting local audiences. 2) Upsell higher-margin items. 3) Consider adjusting store hours to align with peak foot traffic. 4) Offer promotions to attract new customers.
You are a business consultant specializing in coffee shop revenue optimization.
My coffee shop has 100 daily customers, an average order value of $7.50, and operates for 8 hours. I spend $50.00 on marketing, and my foot traffic is 800. How can I increase revenue?

Based on your data, focus on these areas: 1) Increase marketing ROI by targeting local audiences. 2) Upsell higher-margin items. 3) Consider adjusting store hours to align with peak foot traffic. 4) Offer promotions to attract new customers.
